name: Four Growers
headline: Robots that feed the world - robotic harvesting and analytics
description: Four Growers was founded to provide healthy, affordable, local produce by reducing the production costs of greenhouse growers through robotics technology. We are positioning ourselves to be the automated solutions provider for greenhouse crop management. We are working closely with various greenhouse growers to develop a tomato harvesting robot. Our technology relies on two layers of protection, patents filed protecting the physical design of the robot and a proprietary algorithm that controls the robot's decision making. Our solution is not only capable of harvesting the tomatoes, but also of performing a quality check and packaging.

# Future of Food
Robotic harvesting and plant analytics
For greenhouse growers of **tomatoes** , **peppers** and **cucumbers**.
[Let’s Talk](https://fourgrowers.com/<https:/fourgrowers.com/contact/>)
Four Growers was founded to provide **healthy, affordable, local produce** by reducing the production costs of greenhouse growers through robotics technology.
[Our Story](https://fourgrowers.com/<https:/fourgrowers.com/about/>)
![](https://fourgrowers.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/greenhouse-flat-lay-illustration-square-1024x947.png)
## We provide automated solutions for greenhouse crop management
We are working closely with various greenhouse growers to develop a tomato harvesting robot. Two filed patents protect our technology. Our solution not only harvests but it performs quality checks and stores the tomatoes.
[Request a demo](https://fourgrowers.com/<https:/fourgrowers.com/products/request-a-demo/>)
![Bins of tomatoes that were harvested by Four Growers tomato harvesting robot.](https://fourgrowers.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/DSC00403-1024x683.jpg)
8 Stereo Cameras 
Advanced
Greenhouse Technology
Quality Check
Want to learn more?
[Let’s talk ›](https://fourgrowers.com/<https:/fourgrowers.com/products/request-a-demo/>)
![](https://fourgrowers.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/smiling-woman.png)

generated_description:
Four Growers is a forward-thinking startup from Pittsburgh, PA, focused on revolutionizing the agriculture sector through robotics and analytics. Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S18, the startup's core mission—"Robots that feed the world"—revolves around developing automated solutions to enhance crop management, specifically in greenhouses. 

The company aims to provide healthy, affordable, local produce by significantly reducing greenhouse production costs through advanced robotic technology. Their primary project is a tomato harvesting robot, designed in collaboration with greenhouse growers. But it doesn’t stop at harvesting; this robot is equipped to perform quality checks and manage packaging—all crucial tasks that can streamline production and ensure top-quality yield.

Four Growers boasts a strong technological foundation, with two patents filed that safeguard their unique robotic design and proprietary algorithms used for decision-making. Their expertise extends beyond tomatoes to include other high-demand crops like peppers and cucumbers.

With a dedicated team of 14 people and Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, Four Growers is on the cutting edge of agricultural innovation, tapping into key trends in robotics and analytics while making strides toward sustainable food production.

If you’re curious to dive deeper, you can request a demo or explore career opportunities on their [website](https://fourgrowers.com/). With their ambitious goals and practical solutions, Four Growers is poised to have a significant impact on the future of food production.
